successes.title: MaKey MaKey: An Invention Kit for Everyone
successes.description: Ever played Mario on Play-Doh or Piano on Bananas? Alligator clip the Internet to your world and start inventing the future.

Pledges.description: CREATIVE BACKER - Dream up a MaKey MaKey idea, we'll post it on the site.

FULL KIT - Works out of the Box. 
Includes: MaKey MaKey, USB Cable, Alligator Clips, online documentation. Be Stoked! Free shipping in the USA. (Add $10 for international shipping)

DELUXE KIT - One Full Kit, plus the following: A 50 ft. roll of conductive tape, a pack of jumper wires (to plug into the back of the MaKey MaKey), and an extra pack of alligator clips. (Add $15 for international shipping)
GIVE ONE GET ONE 2-PACK - Two full kits shipped to you. Show your generosity to a friend. (Add $15 for international shipping)
DELUXE 2-PACK - Two Deluxe kits. (Add $20 for international shipping)
FAMILY & FRIENDS 3-PACK - Three full kits. (Add $40 for international shipping)
WORKSHOP 5-PACK - Five full kits. Run a workshop! (Add $50 for international shipping)
DELUXE WORKSHOP 5-PACK - Five deluxe kits. (Add $60 for international shipping)
MAKER'S DOZEN 13-PACK - Thirteen full kits for the price of twelve. (Add $100 for international shipping)
SCHOOL / UNIVERSITY / PRO 30-PACK - Thirty full kits at a discount. (Add $150 for international shipping)
RESELLERâ€™S 100-PACK - One hundred full kits. (Add $210 for international shipping)
MINE-ALL-MINE 300-PACK - Three Hundred Full Kits. (Add $400 for international shipping, or contact us, or just throw your wallet at the screen)
